title: Interpreting core forms of urban morphology with CoMo (2025)
summary: New paper on explainable graph neural networks for urban morphology (Computers, Environment and Urban Systems).

title: Walking in the Shade: Shadow-oriented Navigation (2024)
summary: Shadow-oriented navigation system that optimizes pedestrian routes for shade and comfort (ACM GIS 2024).

title: Gap completion in point cloud scenes using SGC-Net (2024)
summary: Method for gap completion in occluded urban point clouds using deep learning (ISPRS Journal).

title: Determination of building flood risk maps from LiDAR mobile mapping data (2022)
summary: Using LiDAR mobile mapping to derive per-building flood risk maps (Computers, Environment and Urban Systems).

title: Extraction and analysis of natural disaster-related VGI from social media (2022)
summary: Review on extracting and using VGI from social media for natural disaster analysis (IJGIS).

title: Flood severity mapping from VGI (2020)
summary: Case study using social media images to estimate flood severity (ISPRS).
